title: Public Homepage loads successfully with all main sections
description: Verify the homepage loads correctly displaying hero section, services summary, doctors preview, and testimonials.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL '/'
Check hero section is visible with correct heading and image
Verify services section displays at least one service
Confirm doctors preview section shows doctor profiles
Validate testimonials section shows patient reviews

title: Public Services page lists all dental services
description: Verify services page loads and displays all available dental services with pricing and descriptions.

steps.description: Navigate to the services page '/services'
Ensure services list is rendered with service names, pricing, and brief details
Check that each listed service has visible pricing and duration if available

title: Multi-step appointment booking completes successfully with valid data
description: Validate that a patient can complete the multi-step appointment booking with doctor and service selection, scheduling, patient details submission, and confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to appointment booking page '/appointments/book'
Select a service from the dropdown
Select an available doctor
Choose a valid date and available time slot
Enter valid patient details: name, email, phone number
Submit the appointment booking form
Check confirmation message/page is displayed with appointment details

title: Appointment booking validations prevent submission with invalid data
description: Ensure input validations prevent proceeding with missing or invalid fields like empty patient name, invalid email, or past date selection.

steps.description: Navigate to appointment booking page
Attempt to proceed without selecting a service
Verify error message for required service selection is displayed
Select service and doctor, then choose a past date
Ensure date validation error prevents proceeding
Enter invalid email format in patient details
Check email format validation error is shown

title: Admin login succeeds with valid credentials and remember me option
description: Verify that the admin can log in using valid email and password, and 'Remember Me' keeps the session active.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page '/admin/login'
Input valid email 'admin@omchabahildental.com.np' and password 'Admin@123'
Check 'Remember Me' checkbox
Click the login button
Confirm successful login to the admin dashboard
Close and reopen browser to verify session persistence
Check admin is still logged in due to 'Remember Me'

title: Admin login fails with incorrect credentials showing error
description: Validate login failure occurs with invalid email or password with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Input incorrect email and/or password
Attempt to login
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials is shown

title: Admin dashboard displays accurate analytics and recent activities
description: Verify that the dashboard loads with correct statistics, recent appointments, and enquiries overview.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to '/admin'
Check analytics charts or numbers are visible and plausible
Verify recent appointments list is displayed with correct statuses
Confirm recent enquiries overview shows inquiries count and summaries

title: Doctors management CRUD operations function properly
description: Ensure admin can create, read, update, and delete doctor profiles, and toggle their active status.

steps.description: Navigate to '/admin/doctors'
Create a new doctor profile with valid data
Verify new doctor appears in list
Edit the created doctor’s details
Check that changes reflect in the doctor profile
Toggle the doctor’s active/inactive status
Confirm the status is updated correctly and visible in the UI
Delete the doctor profile
Ensure doctor is removed from the list

title: Appointments management filters and status updates work correctly
description: Verify admin can view appointments, filter by date/status/doctor, update statuses including marking completion.

steps.description: Navigate to '/admin/appointments'
Apply filters by date range, doctor, and status
Confirm filtered list matches criteria
Select an appointment and update its status to confirmed, cancelled, and completed
Verify status updates are saved and displayed correctly

title: Services management add and edit with validation
description: Ensure services can be added and edited with required fields like name, pricing, duration, and visibility with validations.

steps.description: Go to '/admin/services'
Create a new service with all valid fields
Verify the service is saved and visible in the list
Edit an existing service and change pricing and visibility
Confirm changes are saved and reflected
Attempt to save a service without required fields
Check that validation errors are shown and submission prevented

title: Content management updates reflect immediately
description: Admin updates content such as hero section text, about page, and statistics, and changes appear on the public site.

steps.description: Navigate to '/admin/content/pages'
Edit hero section text and save changes
Verify success message
Visit public homepage and confirm updated hero text appears

title: Blog management create, edit, publish and unpublish posts
description: Verify admin can perform CRUD operations on blog posts and toggle publishing status accurately.

steps.description: Go to '/admin/blog'
Create a new blog post with title and content
Confirm the post is created in draft status
Publish the blog post
Check the post is visible on the public blog page
Unpublish the blog post
Verify post is no longer visible publicly
Edit the post content and save
Ensure changes persist correctly

title: Gallery management handles media categorization and visibility
description: Confirm admin can upload media, assign categories, toggle visibility, and delete gallery items properly.

steps.description: Navigate to '/admin/gallery'
Upload a new media item with category selection
Verify the media item appears in the gallery list with correct category
Toggle visibility status of the media item
Check that visibility update is saved
Delete the media item from gallery
Confirm the media item is removed from the gallery

title: Testimonials management supports rating and visibility toggling
description: Verify admin can create, edit, set rating, toggle visibility, and delete testimonials.

steps.description: Go to '/admin/testimonials'
Add a new testimonial with a rating and patient feedback
Confirm testimonial appears with correct rating
Toggle testimonial visibility off
Verify testimonial is hidden in the public testimonials section
Delete the testimonial
Ensure testimonial is no longer listed

title: Enquiries management enables reply and archive actions
description: Confirm admin can view enquiries, send replies via the admin interface, and archive enquiries properly.

steps.description: Navigate to '/admin/enquiries'
Select an enquiry and reply with a sample message
Verify reply is sent and marked appropriately
Archive the enquiry
Confirm enquiry is moved to archive and not listed with active enquiries

title: Admin users management supports role assignment and password reset
description: Ensure admin can create users with roles, edit roles, and perform password resets.

steps.description: Navigate to '/admin/users'
Add a new admin user with assigned role
Verify user appears in the list with correct role
Edit an existing user's role
Confirm role update is saved
Initiate a password reset for a user
Check confirmation of password reset initiation

title: Security settings allow password change and two-factor authentication enforcement
description: Admin can successfully change their password and enable/disable two-factor authentication with proper validation.

steps.description: Navigate to '/admin/settings/security'
Change the current password to a new valid password
Verify password change success message
Enable two-factor authentication
Confirm two-factor is enabled and prompts on next login
Disable two-factor authentication
Check that two-factor authentication is turned off

title: Admin session management enforces logout and session expiry
description: Verify that admin sessions expire appropriately and logout functions correctly invalidating the session token.

steps.description: Login to the admin panel
Manually trigger logout
Confirm admin is redirected to login page
Simulate session timeout/expiry after inactivity
Verify session expiration forces logout requiring re-authentication

title: Navigation menus function correctly across all public pages
description: Verify top navigation menus load and link correctly across pages: Homepage, About, Services, Doctors, Patients, Gallery, Blog, Contact.

steps.description: Open each public page in sequence
Check navigation menu renders with all expected links
Click each navigation link and verify it directs to the correct page

title: Responsive design renders properly on desktop, tablet, and mobile
description: Validate website layout and functionality adapt seamlessly across screen sizes ensuring usability and accessibility.

steps.description: Open the website on desktop viewport
Verify all components are displayed correctly without overflow
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions
Check layout and navigation adapt appropriately, content remains accessible
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions
Confirm mobile navigation menu works and all content is readable and usable
